attributes.additional_details: The government decided not to extended the validity of theory certificates for people whose certificate expired before the drivers could take a practical test due to the pandemic. The government should thus provide free theory resets.
attributes.background: The government decided not to extended the validity of theory certificates for people whose certificate expired before the drivers could take a practical test due to the pandemic. The government should thus provide free theory resets.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564297
